keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: A low calorie recipe that can be served with seasonal vegetables or a crisp salad.

method.text: Put tomatoes with their juice, green pepper, celery, cucumber and seasoning in pan. Simmer for about 10 min or until thickened.
Scatter mushrooms over bottom of greased ovenproof dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice and onion. Place fish steaks on top and pour over the tomato sauce.
Bake for 30 min or until fish flakes easily.

title: Fish baked with mushrooms
